mlflex.helper
Class AnalysisFileCreator

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.helper.AnalysisFileCreator

public class AnalysisFileCreator
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to transform data from the ML-Flex data format to the format that is required for external software components.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

Constructor Detail

AnalysisFileCreator

public AnalysisFileCreator(java.lang.String outputDirectory,
                           java.lang.String fileNamePrefix,
                           DataInstanceCollection dataInstances,
                           DataInstanceCollection otherInstances,
                           boolean includeDependentVariable)
Constructor

Parameters:
outputDirectory - Absolute path of directory where files will be saved
fileNamePrefix - Text that will be prepended to each file name that is saved
dataInstances - Collection of data dataInstances
otherInstances - Collection of other data instances that may be necessary for determining all options for a given data point (may be left null)
includeDependentVariable - Whether to include dependent-variable values in the output

CreateC5NamesFile

public AnalysisFileCreator CreateC5NamesFile()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
This method creates text files in the format required by the C5.0 software. Specifically, it generates .names files.
